title: Brigandine
description: A running battle through a twisty terraced city of brick, iron and skin. A well-meaning attempt to make a singleplayer map that would flow like a deathmatch one. Secretly just a love letter to BRWINDOW. Inspired by Crucified Dreams, BTSX Episode 2, Gravity Rush, Doom 2016 and Kowloon Walled City.
